entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
